effect_entries.effect: Held: Increases the holder's Cuteness during a Super Contest's Visual Competition.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises the holder's Cuteness while in a contest.

flavor_text_entries.text:
持たせて　コンテストに　参加すると
その　ポケモンは　いつもより
かわいく　みられる。

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
During a Contest, it raises the Cute
aspect of the Pokémon holding it.

Strumento da dare a un Pokémon.
Aumenta la “Grazia” di chi l’indossa in una Gara.

Es muy pesada y hace que el Pokémon que la
lleva se mueva más lento de lo normal.

Ein Item zum Tragen. Trainer erhöhen damit in
Wettbewerben die „Anmut“ ihres Pokémon.

Objet à tenir. Augmente la Grâce d’un Pokémon
dans les Concours.

지니게 하여 콘테스트에 참가하면
그 포켓몬은 여느 때보다
귀엽게 보인다.

もたせて　コンテストに　さんかすると
その　ポケモンは　いつもより
かわいく　みられる。

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It boosts the Cute aspect of the
holder in a Contest.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It boosts the Cute aspect of the
holder in a Contest.

Objet à tenir. Augmente la Grâce
d’un Pokémon dans les Concours.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It boosts the “Cute” aspect of the
holder in a Contest in Sinnoh.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It boosts the “Cute” aspect of the
holder in a Contest.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It boosts the “Cute” aspect of the
holder in a Contest.

An item to be held by a POKéMON.
It boosts the holding POKéMON’s
CUTE condition in CONTESTS.

A hold item that
raises CUTE in
CONTESTS.

raises CUTE in
